content:
Aadaravodu ninnaardrathaye
Vaazhtthikkeertthippaan
Nyangallunarnnangezhunnettu
Sarvvaadhipathe! Sthothram the!

Naathhaa! Maathaavaamkanyaa
Mariyaamin smarana
Valuthaakkitthal praarththhanayaal
Sadayam thuna cheytheedename.

Nibishlleehanmaar sahadenmaa-
Rennivar thal smarana
Valuthaakkitthal praarththhanayaal........

Thaathanmaar gurunaathhanmaa-
Rennivar thal smarana-
Valuthaakki.......

Shobhanacharithan maartthommaa
Shleehaa than smarana-
Valuthaakki..

Kartthaave! Van kadamellaam
Aardrathayaal pokki
Mrtharaam thaathaathaakkall
Kkaashvaasam nalkeedaname.

Nin kaarunyatthinu navamaam
Keertthanavum naathhaa!
Paripaavana naamatthinnaayu
Nandiyumarppikkunnengall.

Thaathan jaatham cheyyicho-nekan, mariyaamin soonu
Anyan thaanennu-llllupadesham vyaajam
Thaathaathmeeyaathmajaneya-kkanyaka pettu jadeekamathaay.

Naathhaa! Nirmmala kanyakayaayu
Ninneppetta-maathaavinnormma
/tsaurabhyamezhum dhoopam pol
/tninne modippikkatte
Ammaykkirulokangallilum
Nalkeedaname-naathhaa! Nallormma

Paavanakanye! Aadiyile
Ninneyetton thaathan samsthuthyan
/thithamaayu ninnil ninnum me-
/tyyetton puthran sthothraarhan
Ninnilirangi vasichonaam paavanaroohaa-yennennum sthuthyan.

Dhanye! Nin praarththhanamevatte nyangallodonni-
Charththhana kettittekeedatte punyam naathhan.

Dheemaanmaare! Varuvin vegam menmelerum
Praarththhanayodum shushrooshayodum jaagrathayodum
Dhanyathayerum kanyakamariyaam thal smaranaykkaayu
Maanikkunnorkkammayirattichekum daanam.

Ninne vaazhtthaan nin veeryatthaal veeryam nedi
Nin praarththhanayaal bhaasurabhavanam pookum nyangall
Nin praarththhanayil sharanamkollllum vigathanmaarum
Jeevipporum doothaganatthil chernneedatte.

Ompathumaasam ninneyettoll than praarththhanayaal
Daivaathmajane! Kopatthin dandozhivaakkenam.

Suvisheshatthil keertthitharaam
Parishuddhanmaare! Bhaagyam
/tjeevagranthhatthil
/tperullllor ningall
Dhanyan ningade perunaallil
Bhakthyaa sambandhikkunnon.

Sahadenmaare! Ningall than
Perunnaallortthaal paaram kaamyam thaan
/tslleebaa paalam vazhi ningall
/tjeevasthhaanam praapichu
Ningalleyaniyikkum noonam
Mohana makudam roohaa saamodam.

Vishvaasam poondaarkkellaam
Sahadenmaare! Vaidyanmaar ningall
/tbhaagyam ningade perunaallil
/tsambandhikkunnon dhanyan
Ningade sabhayil sveekrthanaa-
Mavanaarjikkum-shaashvathamaam jeevan

Ishdanmaar than praarththhanayaal-peju 94
Ishdanmaar than praarththhanayaal
Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyaname
Thalpraarththhanayaal yaachanayaal
Anpaathmaakkallilundaaka.

Nin vrtthaantam roohaayaal
Chonnoraam nibi shleehanmaar
snehaal mrtharaam sahadenmaar
praarththhikkum krpacheyyenam

Kartthaavinnishdam cheythaar
Nirmmalare! Praarththhicheeduvin
nyangallil ninnum neengeedaan
kopatthinnadiyum dandum

Ishdanmaar than praarththhanayaal
Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyaname
Thalpraarththhanayaal yaachanayaal
Anpaathmaakkallilundaaka.

Tharumaddhyatthil parudeesil-
Praapichen nyaan sukhanidra
/tkaattil ketten nyaan-
/tchethohara naadam
Kshamayen paapangallkkellaam-
Thannennaddhvaniyariyichaan

Pethgomo-nyangalleyangumaranneedaathorttheedenam
Msheehaa! Ninne vandikkum
nyangalle dooretthallllaruthe!
/tnyangallkkabhayam neeyallo
/tkaattittharane jeevavazhi
Raavum pakalum sthuthipaadaan
Nyangallkkarhathayekenam.

Aakaashatthil kartthaave! Kaahalla
Naadam pongumpoll
/tpaarakallum kabarum keeri-
/tjeevan mrtharaarjikkumpoll
Anpaal nyangalleyudayone-ni
Nte valatthaayu nirtthenam.

Maartthommaa than praarththhanayaal
naathhan paaree-nnarishatthe neekki
/tnilanirttheedattengum than
/tshamavum shaantiyumathirollam
Thal perunaall kondaadunnor
Baadhakalleennum-rakshitharaavatte

Shuddhanmaar shuddhan neeye-
Nnirulokatthum-vaazhtthum parishuddhaa!
/tnee parishuddhan maartthommaa
/tshleehaaykkaathmavaram nalki
Thal praarththhanayaal rogatthin
Shaantiyodoppam punyavumekaname.

Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyename
Maathrvishuddha praarththhanayaal
Punyam nyangallkkum vaangi-
Ppoyorkkum nalkeedenam.

Thaathanil ninnaathmeeyamathaayu
Jaatham cheythonaam suthane
Kanyakayaam mariyaam shuddhyaa
Pettallo shaareerikamaay.

Goodhamathaayu jaare mevi-
Ghoshatthodudayam cheythaan
Kandaalum kondaadunnu
Saadaramennum thalsmarana.

Shuddhyaa nin meyyullkkondu
Raktham paanam cheythore
Nin naamatthaalaahvaanam
Cheythezhunnelppicheedaname.

Neethiyezhum vidhi nalkaan nee
Vegam vannettheedumpoll
Ninnodotthavaraamodaal
Shobhanageham pookaname.

Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyaname
Maathyavishuddha praarththhanayaal
Punyam nyangallkkum vaangi-
Ppoyorkkum nalkeedaname.
